hotkey.description: Global Hotkey to open the Fancy Tiles layout editor

enableMultiSnappingModifiers.description: Key modifier to enable merging additional regions
enableMultiSnappingModifiers.tooltip: When this key modifier is held down in snapping mode, all selected regions will be merged into a single region into which the window will snap

mergeAdjacentOnHover.description: Merge regions within the mouse radius
mergeAdjacentOnHover.tooltip: When enabled, all regions with a radius of the mouse cursor are merged into a single region into which the window will snap

mergingRadius.description: Radius around the mouse cursor used for merging
